DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect Celebrex ( COX-2 inhibitor non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ) ovulation .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Non-hormonal Cox-2 Inhibitor ( Celebrex ) Ovulation
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 Currently NOT use hormonal contraception Cycle length 2634 day General good health ( specifically hx : diabetes , cardiac problem , moderate/severe heart burn ( GERD ) , obesity ( BMI > 30 ) , hypertension ( BP > 130/80 ) Willing able agree randomization inform consent Willing able use menstrual diary chart bleed Serum progesterone > 3 ng/ml ( cycle day 1825 ) Willing able return clinic biweekly blood test ultrasounds throughout cycle 2 , 3 & 5 Diabetes Cardiac disease Moderate severe heart burn ( GERD ) Obesity ( BMI > 30 ) Hypertension ( BP > 130/80 ) Allergy NSAIDS Currently pregnant try conceive Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome Use hormonal contraception ( participant use barrier method , spermicide , female male sterilization , copper intrauterine device , abstinence , female partner
